title: Thank you for the Lissandra skin Riot!

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly. ) Soraka ! * *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical changes.

body: I'm so happy...It's all I've wanted...and it looks pretty cool! I can't wait to see the particles. I hope there's voice processing.

replies.body: She has new particles, new sound effects and yes, voice processing! I'd love to hear your feedback once you get a chance to take a full look at her! ^-^
Does Program Soraka have voice processing as well? I really want to assume a yes, but I've got high enough hopes for that skin (and Lissandra's skin as well) already.
She absolutely does! :D

Would it be weird to hug you over the internet?

Because I want to hug you over the internet for this news.
http://i.imgur.com/wE4AhMx.gif
Hugged and saved. Thanks a bunch! <3

Pretty cool.  Makes sense too, I remember someone saying that a lot of work goes into Lissandra's visuals (like the shifting ice at her feet) so if  you're gonna make a skin for her, best to make a big one!

Ohhh man, she sure does! All those moving parts! And, if we change the base, that means new animations. x_x Buuuut, we felt she deserved something a bit more hardcore than her other skins! I'd say it came out pretty sweet! ^-^

What made you guys settle on "Program" for the name? I really like the skins, but "Program Lissandra/Soraka" just sound... off to me. It doesn't sound like a proper title or description the way other skin names do and it lacks a certain gravitas. I feel like these skins deserve a cooler-sounding name, something like "Mainframe Lissandra" or "Matrix Soraka."

Just my two cents. Either way, the skins themselves are both amazing.

Writer on the Personalization Publishing team here (I helped name the skin). Thanks for the feedback! Definitely agree with you that "Program" may not be the most clever name. We went through several other options but decided to take a simple and direct route with localization and messaging goals in mind. Ultimately, we made it a priority to pick a name that would be easily understood by players and landed on "Program." Hope that answers your question!
Ah, I see. That makes sense. Thanks for taking the time to stop by and explain!

> [{quoted}](name=kantayams,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=78uuUOn2,comment-id=000000030000,timestamp=2016-03-23T02:55:22.345+0000)
>
> Writer on the Personalization Publishing team here (I helped name the skin). Thanks for the feedback! Definitely agree with you that "Program" may not be the most clever name. We went through several other options but decided to take a simple and direct route with localization and messaging goals in mind. Ultimately, we made it a priority to pick a name that would be easily understood by players and landed on "Program." Hope that answers your question!

Personally, I like Program.

I would have found Lissandra.exe amusing though!

I ask a similar question on the pbe board and came up with a few because I was wondering if the name is finalize. So is it finalized or is their still a chance it might be changed?
> Is the name of the skin finalized because it feel a little bit weird to me.
> 
> I've thought of a few name but they are not perfect.
> 
> Protocol:
> I think this still goes at it in the same way program work. In a crisis we would enable Protocol Soraka where a an army or Heal Bots raindown to heal those in need. The only problem with this is that it might be too similar to Prototype in name.
> 
> I:
> Like IBlitzcrank they are both robotic in theme and have the white material that is very similar. The problem with this is that IBlitzcrank was to commemorate the Mac client exiting beta and this skin had nothing to do with the Mac client
> 
> A.I:
> artificial intelligent this would link it more to other media where their is one robot that is trying to harm a protagonist(Lissandra) and another robot trying to help(Soraka). For example in wall-e we have the evil robot Auto and the good robot Eve both are machine that capable of thinking for themselves so their action reflect what they want. Another example is I,robot where sonny is a robot that try to help will smith and Viki an artificial intelligent tries to kill him.
>

(I was at the gym so I couldn't look at the SkinSpotlight video until now)

I really enjoy the particles of the skin! They look really cybernetic and mesh very well with the skin. However, I find that the sound effects of her skills drown out her VO. Also, I love how her ult looks on herself, but find her ult on an enemy pretty bland looking in comparison. Other than that, I love it.
Thanks for the feedback! I'm going to pass it on to Galetta (she worked on this skin) and her team would be happy to discuss it! :D
*Slowly raises picket sign with the word "SHENPAI" scrawled on it*

I'm so excited that you feel that way! I worked on the concept for this skin way back mid 2015 and it's been a pleasure working with an amazing team to bring it all the way to fruition. As a fellow Lissandra player I'm equally excited to play it >xD

As Katey said a lot of work goes into a Lissandra skin and the team went above and beyond with this one. I can't wait to see what you think of the full package so please let us know.
Is...Is that Lissandra skin a Starcraft reference? I love it, absolutely love it!

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=78uuUOn2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-22T20:40:49.844+0000)
>
> I'm so excited that you feel that way! I worked on the concept for this skin way back mid 2015 and it's been a pleasure working with an amazing team to bring it all the way to fruition. As a fellow Lissandra player I'm equally excited to play it >xD
> 
> As Katey said a lot of work goes into a Lissandra skin and the team went above and beyond with this one. I can't wait to see what you think of the full package so please let us know.

That's cool, now can you point me to the people who work on statistical analysis who hold advanced degrees in mathematics and game theory? 

Do you guys even have any people like that. Many of us feel you don't.

Now if Lissandra got an actual passive I would be soo happy...

I already have blade queen Lissandra, sue me >.<
her passive is kinda annoying in the laning phase. but eh at least you get a free spell. unlike a certain passive which is useless until level 9

Except she has horrid baste mana regen to compensate, so it basically makes it so her passive is "her mana regen is here in the passive instead of being normal"

It's also pretty useless in the lategame when you get enough mana to just not care.
I know right? I bought Blade Queen during Snow Down, now I'm regretting not waiting T^T
From the picture, I honestly thought this was a joke about Sion's new skin being for Lissandra. I hadn't heard about the program skins until now. They look really cool!
We have GLADOS Lissandra. Sweet.
I love these new PROGRAM skins, totally EPIC. They beat the PROJECT line :D (and I have all of those). Can't wait till we see what other creations come in the future.
Just wondering, is the new Sion skin at all related to [Gypsy Danger?](http://cdn.pcwallart.com/images/pacific-rim-jaeger-gypsy-danger-wallpaper-1.jpg)

I don't like the thing at the bottom of her . . . . the green . . . digital effect. I wish that was completely removed, or at least more transparent and lighter, and we were left with just like a bottom half of her. You see floating robots like her all the time and it would have been cool to have a skin that didn't have that ugly effect at the bottom of her. Like it could be that white robot from Wall E . . . . whatever her name is.
She actually reminds me of the YoungLady Process in Transistor. Now I fear she'll spawn a lot of minions after death...
This is all I've ever wanted for my favorite champion. Thank you skin design team! You guys delivered in every way possible with this one :D

As I posted elsewhere:

1) The V shape revealing the midriff cables is much larger and goes much lower on the in-game model. I think the narrower, shorter version from the splash looks better because it makes her look more shapely and makes the bottom half look more like a metal dress.

2) The splash has smaller shoulders and a upper arm "plates," emphasizing the fact that the arms are foating/disconnected. That's super badass, and it's almost completely lost visually in the game version.

3) The game version is a completely different color than the splash, which is mostly teal with the eggshell stripe down the front of the breastplate.

4) The off-white robot plates look amorphous and undefined, especially on her arms. The gray shading is not dark enough to communicate depth, perspective, or that the plates are jointed. It looks like mottled blobs. This also applies to the triangle pyramid at her feet.

5) Insert my recurrent complaint about X skin being beautiful and wonderful, then processed through a filter to desaturate the colors and desharpen all the lines/details before being shipped. 

Spectacular concept, but it looks unfinished, especially next to the brilliant splash. The animations and spell effects look awesome, but the triangle base looks even worse in-game. It's just such a shame that all this time is spent creating wonderful art that gets pushed out looking so muddy and diluted.
